casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timmy SPEIGHT. No. 491PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC. *543Margaret Creasy Ciardella, Hampstead, Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Speight.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of October 2006 by Attorney General for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2006."
